entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the morning then steady.
